Class ALU

  • java.lang.Object
    • ALU

  • public class ALU
extends java.lang.Object
    ALU class represent Arithmetic Logic Unit Performs following operations: add, sub, orr, eor, and, lsl, lsr, cbz, cbnz, beq, bne, bge, bgt, ble, blt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ALU(int wordsize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(boolean flags)
      ADD operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C, checks for flags and sets them based on the argument passed to function
      void and()
      AND operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C
      void beq()
      BEQ operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void bge()
      BGE operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void bgt()
      BGT operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void ble()
      BLE operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void blt()
      BLT operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void bne()
      BNE operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not
      void bus(Bus bus) 
      void cbnz()
      CBNZ operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not, sets flags
      void cbz()
      CBZ operation, ALU fetched data from bus, and sets offset that later is used by instruction to decide whether to branch or not, sets flags
      void dest_c(Register dest) 
      void eor()
      Exclusive OR operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C
      void exec(java.lang.String control, boolean flags)
      Execute ALU operation based on the passed ALU control
      void flags(Flags f) 
      void lsl()
      Left Shift operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C
      void lsr()
      Right Shift operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C
      void orr()
      OR operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C
      void source_a(Register source) 
      void sub(boolean flags)
      SUB operation, ALU fetches data from the bus and writes result in register C, checks for flags and sets them based on the argument passed to function

      • exec

        public void exec(java.lang.String control,
                 boolean flags)
        Execute ALU operation based on the passed ALU control
        Parameters:
        control - - 4 bit String
        flags - - boolean value for setting flags, true - if flags should be set
